title: Foresters Island
creator_credit: Rodney Musch and Tasmanian State Film Unit
brief_description: Portrays the development of the timber resources of Tasmania from the earliest settlement of the State through to the present day large-scale timber operations and the management of the resource by the State Forestry Commission.
